>
> Lamia smiled when she heard those words


Marauder flew in, his massive wings cupping the superheated thermal
updrafts as they flew towards the island in the distance. They flew
towards the single large volcano that dominanted the island. The skies
here were choked with smoke and ash, while the grounds, nearly bereft
of vegatation, were burnt and ruined, only brown whisps of life were
able to hang on tenaciously in this barren rocky landscape, blown
about by hot winds. In several places large gouts of obsidan like
stone rose from the ground as if thrust through the ground by the
violent shaking from beneath. They resmbled the claws and bones of
some terrifyingly huge mishappen beast.

It was over this that marauder flew, carrying Lamia. He finally came
to rest near the top of the volcano, on a lonely ledge. Setting her
down he shifted into his robot mode.

He smiled at her as he gestured at the vista of destruction that was
around them, "Welcome home Lamia." he said, his voice dark and cold.
"This is only the begining."

Behind them a previously hidden door in the cliff face itself opened
revealing only darkness inside. Red lights slowly came on, looking
like burning embers that lit the interior, revelaing a large hall that
led further into the mountain itself.

"Come." Marauder said, "we have much to do."

(TAG)

Preston
